#summary Glossary of Terms

==Glossary==

_A comprehensive list of the domain terms used within your project. Include informative, clear definitions of each term._

  * *_FiRE_: * (*Fi*)le (*R*)enaming (*E*)ngine. The name of our product.
  * *_Renaming Rule:_* The combination of a "Match" and "Replace" pair that defines how to rename any file. A single renaming rule may be applied to many files, and may not always affect each file.
